info.name: Stylus - zenburn
info.description:
a style to fit best with the zenburn editor theme in stylus.

screenshot is made in google chrome.
info.additionalInfo:
change log 2019-12-09 - added new url for firefox moz-extension://c79102d9-47af-4dcd-b7dc-ceef10d3e3e5/ 2018-03-22 - options.html page removed background and border color for sliders 2018-03-21 - sorting filter input field by more aggressiv css selection *[id$="-wrapper"] input & select and .filter-selection input & select some !important attributes change 2018-02-19 - smaller width than 850px quick accessible header due to sticking to the top. - search box improved for dark theme (icons clear[red], previous[blue], next[blue], close hover color [red], found number [green]) - manage.html remove style intern border lines for new ui 2018-01-30 - new mozilla extension url included (10edaf7e-5e7e-42ed-b6ff-f161c34b40a3) - red colored inline search result delete button (v 1.1.8) (works for chrome) 2018-01-23 - correction for not allowed cursor 2018-01-21 - global input, button, select shows not allowed cursor if disabled. - manage.html - opacity for disabled styles. so the border in the new ui is not affected. - edit.html for usercss title shows not allowed cursor. 2018-01-11
  • message box correction. now for all extension pages
2017-12-19
  • search result integration in popup.html
2017-12-18
  • slight change for header on edit page with a width under 850pixels
2017-12-13
  • changes on svg arrows
  • manage.html vertical align for expanded new UI changed to top
2017-12-11
  • hover state for checkbox on all pages
  • #search on manage.html
2017-12-10
  • changes on style due to update on stylus extension
2017-12-05
  • licence change from public domain to no redistribution - original published on userstyles.org
2017-12-04
  • update due to changes on stylus addon. mostly on popup.html and edit.html page
2017-10-07
  • manage.html - filter left margin for select to avoid overlapping the checkbox (checked in chrome - todo: corss browser test)
2017-07-10
  • options page url changed
2017-07-10
  • support added for firefox and opery (stylus only)
  • cross browser tests - the additional checkbox work around does not work in firefox
2017-05-31
  • added black text color to update notification text
  • every 2nd entry on the manage screen has got a gray background color
  • removed global part from style. cause userstyles.org leaves themes unmentioned if they contain a global part
2017-05-04
  • some corrections for adaptive design matters (smaller widths)
2017-05-03
  • style created
  • style uploaded
  • style testes with chrome 58.0.3029.96
  • screenshot added
